name: HYBRID INVERTER
fullDescription:
The Gootu 6KW 48V Hybrid Inverter (v2.0) is a compact, high-performance hybrid inverter engineered for homes and small commercial setups.

With a wide MPPT window, high PV/AC charging currents and robust BMS connectivity (CAN/RS485), it delivers reliable pure-sine backup, simultaneous solar + grid operation and flexible battery support for uninterrupted power.

ğŸ”§ Supported Battery Types: Gel, lead-acid, and lithium battery compatibility (configurable)

ğŸŒ Communication & Monitoring: USB + BMS (485) / CAN/RS485 for BMS integration; Wi-Fi optional for remote monitoring

ğŸ”„ Dual Output / Parallel Ready: Dual output design for flexible load distribution; model supports parallel operation on applicable SKUs (check model spec)
